name: coprompt
description: A browser extension that enhances AI interactions

scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p dist && cp -R background.js content.js injected.js content.css options.html options.js popup.html popup.js manifest.json icons utils background content dist/
scripts.set-debug-false: replace-in-file --string='const DEBUG = true;' --replacement='const DEBUG = false;' dist/**/*.js
scripts.set-debug-false-hardcoded: replace-in-file --string='const DEBUG = false;' --replacement='const DEBUG = false;' dist/**/*.js
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npm run copy-files
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run copy-files && npm run set-debug-false && npm run set-debug-false-hardcoded && echo "Production build ready in dist/"
scripts.package: npm run build:prod && web-ext build --source-dir dist --overwrite-dest
